article.title: InfoReliance to Provide Microsoft Consulting Services
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: InfoReliance Corporation, Fairfax, Virginia, is being awarded an $8,680,046 time-and-material with firm-fixed-price options contract for expert Microsoft consulting services to fully enable new technologies in support of its business and mission needs. Contract funds will be a combination of research and development funds, and operations and maintenance funds. The Defense Threat Reduction Agency, Fort Belvoir, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
